pullrequest.title: update TurtleBot3 models and add TurtleBot3 House

content.raw:
It looks like this model has several nested models which are also found on the database. We could avoid duplication and instead of copying their description here, use the `<include>` tag, which takes the model and copies their links into this one.

For example:

~~~
<model name='turtlebot3_house'>
....
  <include>
    <uri>model://mailbox</uri>
    <pose>0.883462 -0.576236 0 0 0 -3.14159</pose>
  </include>
...
</model>
~~~
content.html:
It looks like this model has several nested models which are also found on the database. We could avoid duplication and instead of copying their description here, use the <include> tag, which takes the model and copies their links into this one.

For example:

<model name='turtlebot3_house'>
....
  <include>
    <uri>model://mailbox</uri>
    <pose>0.883462 -0.576236 0 0 0 -3.14159</pose>
  </include>
...
</model>
